question: Show all comedies and tragedies written by William Shakespeare.
sql_query1:
SELECT Play.Title 
FROM Play
WHERE (Play.Theatrical_Form = "Comedy" OR Play.Theatrical_Form = "Tragedy") AND Play.Author = "William Shakespeare"
sql_query2:
SELECT Play.Title 
FROM Play
WHERE Play.Theatrical_Form = "Comedy" OR Play.Theatrical_Form = "Tragedy" AND Play.Author = "William Shakespeare"
interpretation1: Show me all the William Shakespeare plays classed as either comedy or tragedy.
interpretation2: Give me all the comedies, also show the Shakespeare tragedies.
